BILL.TITLE: Multiannual programme for enterprise and entrepreneurship

DEBATE-SPEECH.TEXT: The next item is the debate on the report (A6 – 0118/2005) by Mrs Britta Thomsen, on behalf of the Committee on Industry, Research and Energy, on the proposal for a decision of the European Parliament and of the Council amending Council Decision 2000/819/EC on a multiannual programme for enterprise and entrepreneurship, and in particular for small and medium – sized enterprises (SMEs) (2001 – 2005) (COM(2004)0781 – C6 – 0242/2004 – 2004/0272(COD)).
